thread.title: Showers today in Cleveland area, but sunshine over weekend
thread.title_full: Showers today in Cleveland area, but sunshine over weekend | cleveland.com

author: Cliff Pinckard, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Showers today in Cleveland area, but sunshine over weekend
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio — Cooler temperatures and damp conditions are in the forecast today for the Akron area.
Thursday's high was 76 degrees, but it's expected to top out at about 65 degrees today. The day is starting with showers in the area and more rain is possible tonight. It also will get cool tonight, with lows in the 40s.
Sunshine returns Saturday but it will be cool, with a high of 60. Sunday also will be sunny and temperatures will rebound to around 70 degrees.
Here's the seven-day forecast from the National Weather Service:
Friday : Showers likely, mainly before 7 a.m. Cloudy with a high near 65. West wind 10 to 15 mph becoming northwest in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 60 percent. New precipitation amounts of less than a 10th of an inch possible. A slight chance of showers Friday night before midnight. Cloudy, then gradually becoming partly cloudy with a low around 48. North wind 9 to 14 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20 percent.
Saturday : Mostly sunny with a high near 60. Northeast wind around 5 mph becoming calm in the morning. Mostly clear Saturday night with a low around 48. Calm wind becoming south 5 to 7 mph after midnight.
Sunday : Sunny with a high near 70. Mostly clear overnight with a low around 54.
Monday (Columbus Day) : A chance of showers after 2 p.m. Mostly sunny with a high near 75. Chance of precipitation is 30 percent. A chance of showers Monday night. Mostly cloudy with a low around 51. Chance of precipitation is 30 percent.
Tuesday : A chance of showers. Partly sunny with a high near 60. Chance of precipitation is 30 percent. Partly cloudy Tuesday night with a low around 46.
Wednesday : Mostly sunny with a high near 64. Partly cloudy Wednesday night with a low around 48.
Thursday : Mostly sunny with a high near 64.
